title: Backplate soft pad "H" with buoy pocket TRAVEL - without bolts and nuts

photos.alt: Wyściółka H na płytę / kieszeń na boję - TecLine Travel

description:
Product description

"H" SHAPE SOFTPAD FOR BACKPLATE WITH SMB POCKET

 

DESCRIPTION:

- Softpad for the backplate protection, made of soft, breathable material

- It provides additional comfort of using modular BCD with a backplate, both, when carrying equipment on the surface and when diving with very thin wetsuit or "bareback"

- The softpad is additionally equipped with a small pocket allowing to stow an SMB behind the diver's back

- "H" shape is compatible with all standard size backplates and H-shape backplates

 

 

NOTE!

THE PRODUCT IS SOLD WITHOUT SCREWS. IF NECESSARY, ADD TO ORDER:

 

- For the softpad fixation only:

6 x SS screw (short) with derlin nut, ref. T01100 or 6 x SS screw, short (10 mm) with SS nut and o-ring, ref. T01105

 

- For the double-accessory fixation (e.g. softpad + weight pocket):

2 x SS screw (long) with derlin nut, ref. T01090 and 4 x SS screw (short) with derlin nut, ref. T01100 (for the softpad + weight pockets fixation) or 2 x SS screw, long (14 mm) with SS nut and o-ring, ref. T01103 and 4 x SS screw, short (10 mm) with SS nut and o-ring, ref. T01105
